properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
VESSEL CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT VICINITY 33-20N 013-41E.
100 PERSONS OVERBOARD. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO M/V STIJENERBORG OR MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 3906 592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT
